Aboutme

BIO

Little did I know I was ever going to land into web development. Hi, I´m Randy Prempeh, Ghana is my homeland. I have been living in Düsseldorf for quite some time now. I am web developer coupled with previous experience in Marketing and International Business background. I have always been the sales kinda guy, meeting target and finding what customers/consumers needs till I added this satisfying fantasy of user experience.
I love to constantly evolve myself with trendy stuff which aided me to learn frontend development, that is HTML, CSS and JavaScript with its inherent frameworks as well as backend with Nodejs, MongoDB to mention a few. I am always hungry more knowledge, hence on the verge to even learn much more prior to the coding life that I have chosen.I adapt swiftly to new milieu and overall committed to tasks, flexible, having a great sense of humour with good communication skills.
